intro: Manotes macrantha, commonly known as the large-flowered manotes, is a flowering plant native to certain regions of Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its showy, clustered flowers that are typically pink or white in color. Its leaves are opposite and often have a slightly hairy texture. Manotes macrantha is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forests or along stream banks.
